about_the_game:
Written by Herculion staff member Cort Channon, this 171-page digital guide book contains everything you need to know about the game, and then some. In the tradition of the feature-rich game guides of old, we’ve packed this guide with art, info, and extras to make it the ultimate companion to Full Service!

FEATURES:
  • Profiles for every character, complete with commentary by the staff
  • A guide to Morningwood, including shops, items, affinity, and dating
  • Detailed illustrated walkthroughs for every route, story scene, and heart event
  • End-of-story flowchart to help you get all 20 endings
  • Information about the special route that opens on your second playthrough
  • Guide to Steam achievements
  • Everything has been checked against the game code line-by-line to ensure accuracy!

PLUS a 52-Page BONUS SECTION including:
  • Detailed discussions of every member of the main cast, including character analyses, story breakdowns, and a behind-the-scenes look at how they evolved during development!
  • Galleries of scene mockups and Backgrounds!
  • Never-before-seen concept art!
  • You asked for it; here it is: A special post-ending story for Tomoki and the twins in the form of an exclusive, smoking-hot 7200-word short story penned by Cort Channon, with a bonus illustration by Mazjojo!

==

Where to find the DLC?

After downloading this DLC, please check the folder where your copy of Full Service is installed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/07/08/10
  • Processor: Pentium III 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 8MB

short_description: Presenting The Full Service Complete Visual Guide, this 171-page guide includes a comprehensive guide to the game, plus over 50 pages of bonus content including art, commentary, and a new 7200-word short story!
